src:
“No estamos metidos en eso”, dice AMLO ante cuestionamientos sobre Pegasus | Entérate
 by Redacción AN / AL



El presidente Andrés Manuel López Obrador dijo que su gobierno no utiliza el malware Pegasus para espiar ni perseguir a nadie, porque en la oposición les tocó sufrir este tipo de abusos.
text:
"We are not involved in that," says AMLO to questions about Pegasus | Find out
 by AN / AL Writing



President Andrés Manuel López Obrador said that his government does not use Pegasus malware to spy on or persecute anyone, because in the opposition they had to suffer this type of abuse.
